name: One Room? - Uno no U
description:
One Room? Game Info

To Progress to each of the levels, You need to left click on the switch to change the level. WASD keys are the movement, and left click is to attack/interact.

Level Guides

To complete the first level, Collect the key and place the tree bark within the tree to progress to the switch to change the level.

To complete the second level, Defeat all the enemies within a 2 minute timer. Which unlocks the switch.

To complete the third level, Place all three boxes on the three pressure plates in 1 minute. Which unlocks the switch.

To complete the forth level, defeat the boss and win the game.
